title: Motorbike Engine Sounds - Vol. 2
description: Game ready, seamlessly looping sound clips of 6 different motorbike engines. Ideal sound pack for Racing, Motorbikes and Open World games. Comes with a highly detailed FMOD sound bank.
longDescription:
This is the Volume 2 pack of Motorbike Engine Sounds.


Game ready, seamlessly looping sound clips of 6 motorbike engines.

Ideal engine sound pack for Street Racing, Motorbikes and Open World games. All sound files are game ready, seamlessly looping sound clips. Contain computer generated sounds.

Product comes with a highly detailed FMOD sound bank.


Short Demo video: https://youtu.be/svKuneT2Di4

Long Demo video: https://youtu.be/Z9R4ZYwauGg


Read here the documentation: Documentation.pdf

Tutorial video for implementing Fmod vehicle sound into UE 5: https://youtu.be/wo3kNR-WRQQ


Contain the following engine sound packs:

  • 125 ccm Dirt Bike
  • 300 ccm Moped Bike
  • 535 ccm Cruiser Bike
  • 600 ccm Sport Bike
  • 850 ccm Cruiser Bike
  • 1200 ccm Sport Bike
  • Gear shifting sound clips


The highly detailed FMOD project comes with a sample for these extra sound effects:

  • Wind SFX
  • Gear Changing SFX
  • Tyre Screeching SFX


List of sound clips:

  • startup: engine startup sound
  • engine_off: turning off engine sound
  • idle: engine's idle sound
  • idle_low_off: engine sound between idle and low rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • idle_low_on: engine sound between idle and low rpms when gas pedal is pressed
  • low_off: engine sound at low rpm sound when gas pedal is not pressed
  • low_on: engine sound at low rpm sound when gas pedal is pressed
  • low_med_off: engine sound between low and medium rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • low_med_on: engine sound between low and medium rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • med_off: engine sound at medium rpm sound when gas pedal is not pressed
  • med_on: engine sound at medium rpm sound when gas pedal is pressed
  • med_high_off: engine sound between medium and high rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • med_high_on: engine sound between medium and high rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • high_off: engine sound at high rpm sound when gas pedal is not pressed
  • high_on: engine sound at high rpm sound when gas pedal is pressed
  • very_high_off: engine sound at very high rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • very_high_on: engine sound at very high rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • maxRPM: engine sound at maximum rpm limiter sound
  • aggressiveness_off_fx: extra sound clip for changing the engine sound's "aggressiveness" when the gas pedal is not pressed - read the documentation to learn more about this SFX
  • aggressiveness_on_fx: extra sound clip for changing the engine sound's "aggressiveness" when the gas pedal is pressed - read the documentation to learn more about this SFX


These sound clips also exist in "interior" version, these interior sound clips are made for that case when the player is sitting inside the vehicle.


If you have suggestions or problems, feel free to contact me in Email, Facebook, or fill out the contact form on my website.

May not be available to respond to messages during weekends and holidays.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 6 complete engine sound packs (40 wav file per sound pack)
  • All wav files are seamlessly looped
  • Sounds are pre-recorded for both exterior and interior camera views
  • Pre recorded off load sounds
  • Pre recorded "aggressiveness SFX" sound - ideal for simulating engine / exhaust upgrade or when the bike lost its exhaust
  • 252 wav files: sound clips for interior and exterior camera views + start / stop engine SFX + aggressiveness SFX + gear changing sound clips
  • Gear changing sound clips (12 wav files, 6 for exterior and 6 for helmet "pov” view)
  • Detailed FMOD project

Number of Audio Waves: 252

Number of Audio Cues: 252

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 06:11

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All

Documentation: Link

releaseInfo.releaseNote: First release of a brand new product.
